attributes.action: Tackle the epidemic of suicides in North Belfast
attributes.background: Northern Ireland has been stricken with suicides for years and it's widely known that North Belfast has had an epidemic for years of suicides. In the last week 2 young neighbours have taken their lives and left behind a torn community. Parents are petrified of their kids actions

rejection.details:
Responsibility for health services in Northern Ireland has been devolved, which means that your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
